alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 4:01PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms with moderate to heavy rain will impact portions of northeastern Pondera, northwestern Liberty, northeastern Glacier and Toole Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms along and near highway 2. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy rainfall up to three quarters of an inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water on roadways and difficult driving on rural roads. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Cut Bank, Sunburst, Kevin, Ethridge, Oilmont, Santa Rita, Ferdig, Devon, Dunkirk and Galata. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 355 and 397. Highway 2 between mile markers 238 and 306. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for north central Montana.
